description: PIMS 1273 CC FP: Armenia – Improving the Energy Efficiency of Municipal Heating and Hot Water Supply

subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description: Institutional and financial foundation is laid and other key barriers to the sustainable development of the heat and hot water supply services in Armenia are removed, reducing  GHG emissions and improving their quality and affordability to the customers.
donor_long: WCC Armenia Interchurch Charitable RT Fo
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: PIMS 1273 CC FP: Improving EE
